alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Coffee and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 603 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Hazlehurst to near Broxton to near Douglas. Movement was slowly west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Broxton, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
